languages.text: "Им начертан иной путь. Пес Простора, Калькасар, бежал, бросив опекаемые им миры на произвол судьбы. Несущие Слово позаботятся, чтобы весь сектор услышал сию весть отчаяния, ибо в ужасе и горе души смогут открыться для воли Истинных Богов".

"A different path is ordained for them. Calcazar, the watchdog of the Expanse, ran, thereby condemning the worlds he was tasked to protect. The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."
languages.original_text: "Им начертан иной путь. Пес Простора, Калькасар, бежал, бросив опекаемые им миры на произвол судьбы. Несущие Слово позаботятся, чтобы весь сектор услышал сию весть отчаяния, ибо в ужасе и горе души смогут открыться для воли Истинных Богов".

traits.locale_text: "A different path is ordained for them. The watchdog of the Expanse Calcazar ran, thereby condemning the worlds he was tasked to protect. The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

"A different path is ordained for them. Calcazar, the watchdog of the Expanse, ran, thereby condemning the worlds he was tasked to protect. The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

languages.text: 「彼らには異なる道が定められている。エクスパンスの番犬であったカルカサルは逃げ出し、結果、彼が守ることを任じられていた世界は獄に落ちた。ワードベアラーは、この絶望の潮流を、宙域全体へと届けるだろう。恐怖と災いの中でこそ、真なる神々の意志へと魂は啓かれるのだ」
languages.original_text: "A different path is ordained for them. Calcazar, the watchdog of the Expanse, ran, thereby condemning the worlds he was tasked to protect. The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らには異なる道が定められている。エクスパンスの番犬であったカルカサルは逃げ出し、結果、彼が守ることを任じられていた世界は獄に落ちた。ワードベアラーは、この絶望の潮流を、宙域全体へと届けるだろう。恐怖と災いの中でこそ、真なる神々の意志へと魂は啓かれるのだ」

languages.text: “他们要踏上另一条为他们准备的道路。科罗努斯扩区的看门狗卡尔卡扎逃跑了，他麾下的所有世界都将落入我们手中。怀言者会在整个科罗努斯扩区散播这些令人绝望的消息。只有在恐惧与悲伤之中，那些灵魂才会向真神的意志敞开大门。”
languages.original_text: "A different path is ordained for them. Calcazar, the watchdog of the Expanse, ran, thereby condemning the worlds he was tasked to protect. The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

traits.locale_text: “他们要踏上另一条为他们准备的道路。科罗努斯扩区的看门狗卡尔卡扎逃跑了，他麾下的所有世界都将落入我们手中。怀言者会在整个科罗努斯扩区散播这些令人绝望的消息。只有在恐惧与悲伤之中，那些灵魂才会向真神的意志敞开大门。”

languages.text: « Une différente Voie leur est prescrite. Calcazar, le chien de garde des Étendues, a pris la fuite, condamnant ainsi les mondes qu'il était chargé de protéger. Les Word Bearers veilleront à ce que le secteur tout entier entende ces témoignages de désespoir, car c'est dans la terreur et la douleur que l'âme s'ouvre à la volonté des dieux véritables. »
languages.original_text: "A different path is ordained for them. Calcazar, the watchdog of the Expanse, ran, thereby condemning the worlds he was tasked to protect. The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

traits.locale_text: « Une différente Voie leur est prescrite. Calcazar, le chien de garde des Étendues, a pris la fuite, condamnant ainsi les mondes qu'il était chargé de protéger. Les Word Bearers veilleront à ce que le secteur tout entier entende ces témoignages de désespoir, car c'est dans la terreur et la douleur que l'âme s'ouvre à la volonté des dieux véritables. »

languages.text: «Les está reservado un camino diferente. Calcazar, el perro guardián de la Extensión, ha huido condenando los mundos que debía proteger. Los Portadores de la Palabra se encargarán de que este mensaje de desesperación llega a todo el sector, pues el terror y el pesar son lo que abre el alma a la voluntad de los Dioses Verdaderos».
languages.original_text: "A different path is ordained for them. Calcazar, the watchdog of the Expanse, ran, thereby condemning the worlds he was tasked to protect. The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

traits.locale_text: «Les está reservado un camino diferente. Calcazar, el perro guardián de la Extensión, ha huido condenando los mundos que debía proteger. Los Portadores de la Palabra se encargarán de que este mensaje de desesperación llega a todo el sector, pues el terror y el pesar son lo que abre el alma a la voluntad de los Dioses Verdaderos».

languages.text: "Ihnen ist ein anderer Pfad bestimmt. Calcazar, der Wachhund der Ausdehnung, ist geflohen und hat die Welten, die er schützen sollte, damit verdammt. Die Word Bearers werden dafür sorgen, dass der gesamte Sektor diese verzweifelten Neuigkeiten erfährt, denn erst in Entsetzen und Leid öffnet sich die Seele dem Willen der Wahren Götter."
languages.original_text: "A different path is ordained for them. Calcazar, the watchdog of the Expanse, ran, thereby condemning the worlds he was tasked to protect. The Word Bearers will see to it that the entire sector hears these tidings of despair, for it is in terror and woe that the soul opens to the will of the True Gods."

Die Word Bearers werden dafür sorgen, dass der gesamte Sektor diese verzweifelten Neuigkeiten erfährt, denn erst in Entsetzen und Leid öffnet sich die Seele dem Willen der Wahren Götter."
